* D kept on wriggling, panting and letting his tongue lull out. His from 
arms/linms began to paw out towards the approaching land and his legs 
dangled down under him.
Land! Land! That was all he could think about!
D barked and growled, his fur bristling along his back and shoulders, ears 
layed back against his head.
He had never actually seen a world before, always been in the scientific 
vessel and what black space was beyond it. This was new.
The color, the vastness...the NOISE!
D kept struggling. He didn't mean to be rude and all by moving so much. He 
judt wanted down.
Though it did pass through his mind that this woman, so the smell told him 
it was femm, might not know that all he wanted was to feel earth under his 
paws.*

" Down! DOWN!"

* He howled. His voice wasn't gruff when he spoke words; it was rather 
smooth and young. But it was quite different when he made the sounds in 
which his creature form could make.*
